channel.title: Updated oauth login mechanisms
channel.description: Due to a recent internal change, I needed to update/refresh the oauth mechanisms for signing into this forum. I updated oauth settings for Google, Twitter, Facebook, and Github logins. Send me an email or a DM if you find any issues.

item.title: Updated oauth login mechanisms
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Due to a recent internal change, I needed to update/refresh the oauth mechanisms for signing into this forum. I updated oauth settings for Google, Twitter, Facebook, and Github logins. Send me an email or a DM if you find any issues.
